(0, 2881).label: variable

(0, 2881).label: variable

(0, 2881).label: variable
(0, 2881).description: The temperature of the surrounding air, which can influence the formation and persistence of contrail cirrus clouds

(0, 2881).label: variable

(0, 2881).name: Earth's radiation budget
(0, 2881).label: variable
(0, 2881).description: The balance of incoming and outgoing radiation that affects the Earth's climate, which can be influenced by contrail cirrus clouds

(0, 2881).name: net effective radiative forcing
(0, 2881).label: variable
(0, 2881).description: A measure of the impact of human activities, such as aviation, on the Earth's climate system, expressed in units of energy per unit area

(0, 2881).name: global average effective radiative forcing
(0, 2881).label: variable
(0, 2881).description: A measure of the average impact of human activities, such as aviation, on the Earth's climate system, expressed in units of energy per unit area

(0, 2881).name: incoming solar radiation
(0, 2881).label: variable

(0, 2881).name: outgoing infrared radiation
